meanings.definition: A strip of hair left to grow above the upper lip.
meanings.sent3: The moustachio on his face wiggled when he laughed.
meanings.sent4: His moustachio was like a fuzzy caterpillar on his lip.
meanings.sent5: The gentleman's moustachio was perfectly groomed and stylish.

meanings.definition: To grow or wear a moustachio.
meanings.sent1: He decided to moustachio for the charity event.
meanings.sent2: She proudly moustachios her upper lip hair.
meanings.sent3: The actor had to moustachio for his new role.
meanings.sent4: In the winter, he likes to moustachio for warmth.
meanings.sent5: They moustachioed together as a sign of solidarity.

meanings.definition: A person who wears a moustachio.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy was known as the town's moustachio.
meanings.sent2: She dressed up as a moustachio for the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The detective with the curly moustachio solved the case.
meanings.sent4: He was the only moustachio in the group.
meanings.sent5: The old photograph showed a group of mustachioed men.
